definition: abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives
when everybody gathers fuel, the flames are higher (idiom)/the more people, the more strength
pinyin: zhong4 ren2 shi2 chai2 huo3 yan4 gao1

sentences.english: Chihiro has thus been recognized by everyone to achieve their value.
sentences.chinese: 千寻也因此获得众人的认可，实现了自己的价值。

sentences.english: Type SEVENs enjoy being the center of attention.
At this point of time, Hanwen arrives to arrest Shouye.
sentences.chinese: 这时汉文与伟民前来拘捕守业，众人吃惊。

sentences.english: The exhibition of folk customs includes an attractive display of local foods.
sentences.chinese: 家乡风味食品在这届民俗民风展览会上引众人注目。

sentences.english: And the much-awaited announcement of the bank rescue plan left everyone confused rather than reassured.
sentences.chinese: 而期待已久的银行救援计划让众人疑惑而非放心。

sentences.english: Yesterday was the last time for me to play the Jpananese drams before the spectators.
sentences.chinese: 在众人面前的演奏昨天也迎来了其暂时的帷幕。

sentences.english: And the multitude said, This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee.
sentences.chinese: 众人说，这是加利利拿撒勒的先知耶稣。

sentences.english: As he went along, people spread their cloaks on the road.
sentences.chinese: 走的时候，众人把衣服铺在路上。

sentences.english: Biden's biography, he told the crowd, and, after meeting him, declared: 'I think the book is much better.
sentences.chinese: 在与拜登会面后，他告诉众人说，我觉得书要好得多。

sentences.english: As soon as the people saw him, they brought thirty companions to be with him.
sentences.chinese: 众人看见参孙，就请了三十个人陪伴他。

sentences.english: But then have a large number of the soldiers of qing appear, iron young tiger immediately call all fled.
sentences.chinese: 但随即已有大批清兵出现，铁彪立刻叫众人躲避。

sentences.english: Isn't there a problem in one of the players owning the scorecard that everybody uses?
sentences.chinese: 一位玩家持有众人使用的记分卡，这难道没有问题么？

sentences.english: Do you remember the time I flirted with all
sentences.chinese: 我故意跟众人打情骂俏。

sentences.english: The politician is in the limelight showing off.
sentences.chinese: 这位政客是个在众人面前爱出风头的人。

sentences.english: The inestimable value of our Federal Union is felt and acknowledged by all.
sentences.chinese: 我们联邦联盟的不可估量的价值为众人所感受和认可。

sentences.english: Pray for many in Chishui to know Christ and to cross from death to life.
sentences.chinese: 愿赤水的众人能认识基督并出死入生。

definition: abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives
to stand in a circle and watch
variant of 嘩然|哗然[hua2 ran2]
in uproar/commotion/causing a storm of protest/tumultuous
to raise eyebrows/to cast sidelong glances (expressing fear or indignation)/shocked/surprised
one after another/in succession/one by one/continuously/diverse/in profusion/numerous and confused/pell-mell
